name: us-atlas
description: Pre-built TopoJSON from the U.S. Census Bureau.

scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && cd ../../d3/d3.github.com && git pull && cp ../../topojson/us-atlas/us/10m.json us-10m.v${npm_package_version%%.*}.json && git add us-10m.v${npm_package_version%%.*}.json && git commit -m "us-atlas ${npm_package_version}" && git push && cd -
